story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Mellon Financial Corp. MEL.N, which is being acquired by Bank of New York Co. Inc. (BK.N), said on Wednesday that it has sold stakes in its venture capital business. The sale of the portfolio to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. (GS.N) affiliate Goldman Sachs Private Investments Ltd. and New MVI LP is expected to generate an after-tax loss of about $70 million, Mellon said in a regulatory filing.
story.title: mellon says selling venture capital stakes
